Name: boneia_bidens
Note:
"Simons (2005) follows Corbet and Hill (1992) by referrering this  species to the subgenus Boneia. Some authors (Andersen 1912, Koopman 1993) place it in its own genus (Boneia) but see Bergmans and Rozendal (1998) and Bergmans (1994)." 
I guess it depends who you would like to follow. Just leave the name of the genus as it is.
